name: maggic_cohort
title: Patients with Diagnosis of Heart Failure
description: This cohort includes patients aged 18 or above with a diagnosis of heart failure and at least one encounter (patient visit or hospital admission) with cardiology after the first heart failure diagnosis.

entity.name: pid
entity.description: A unique identifier assigned to each patient in the cohort.

entry.name: withHeartFailure
entry.description: Selects the patients diagnosed with heart failure.

exit.name: deceased
exit.description: When a patient dies, they are removed from the population/cohort.

exit.name: lastRecordDate
exit.description: The latest recorded encounter end time marks the patientâ€™s exit time.

period.description: Includes only the first event time and the last exit time for patients included in the cohort definition.
